bibl.note: Refers to the animals of the deaconia of the monastery of Apa Apoll√¥s, and to some landowners who wish to deduct the expenses from the Imperial revenue. Aphrodite, either after A.D. 573/4 or about A.D. 589/590.
Hanafi Alia, A Letter from the Archive of Dioscorus.
